description:
Who wants to look young and beautiful forever?

I'm sure you raised your hand over there. Ok, well we can’t actually stop the clock but there are ways we can make our youth last longer, feel stronger, healthier and more energized throughout the year—and for many, many years to come! How? Look no further than your fridge for some of the best age-defying treatments!

Positive psychology savvy and chef, Florence Servan-Schreiber, is here to show you the most delicious, colorful and quick meals that will help you to slow down the aging process! You will become an expert of age-defying foods and ingredients.

Let’s cook! Happiness is just a click away!
title: Happier Cooking – REJUVENATION
